definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. (active Pt. in u, acc. to Ba:NB 175), [[דְּבַד הַמֶּלֶח נׇחוּץ]] 1Sa 21:9 the king's business was urgent (LXX kata\ spoudh/n, A kataspeu=don). (Thes cp. Ar.nah.ad.a ursit instititgue rogando [Kam Frey]); text dub.; HPS [[נׇאוֹץ]] (from [[אוץ]]), > [[נחושׁ]].
